tool_description: Compares actual meal plan nutrition against requirements to identify deficiencies, excesses, and supplementation needs.

actual_protein_grams.description: Actual protein intake from meal plan

actual_fat_grams.description: Actual fat intake from meal plan

actual_carb_grams.description: Actual carbohydrate intake from meal plan

micronutrient_targets.description: Target values for vitamins and minerals

micronutrient_actuals.description: Actual values for vitamins and minerals

error_messages: Invalid nutrient values: All nutrient values must be non-negative numbers
Micronutrient array mismatch: Target and actual micronutrient arrays must have same length
Tolerance out of range: Tolerance percentage must be 5-25%
usage: Compare target vs actual macronutrient intake by providing all six macronutrient parameters. Optionally include micronutrient_targets and micronutrient_actuals arrays, and set tolerance_percentage for gap analysis.
